title: Cake shop receives extremely creepy decorating request - for customer’s ‘daddy'
text:

It sounds like quite a nice cake... until you get to the icing. 
You might be aware that ice cream shop Baskin Robbins makes cakes, too. You can get flavours such as Oreo, with white vanilla sponge and colourful icing. Good news. 
The chain lets customers 'customise' their bakes. Choose an ice cream flavour, icing style, and, yes, the writing on the top of it. 
Naturally, then, staff at Baskin Robbins get some unusual requests. And sometimes they're naughty. Of course they are. This one is certainly one of the more elaborate and risque... Read More 
"Happy birthday daddy," reads the customer request. "Get ready to eat this cake like you eat me." 
Wow. What would Mary Berry think? Let's not ask her. 
The cake form was shared on Reddit – apparently by the boyfriend of the female employee tasked with created the 'sexy' bake. People chimed in with naughtiness. We're sure you can imagine – have a read if you fancy. 
And then the actual decorated cake arrived on the scene (so the sharer says). Except it wasn't what the customer had in mind. Highly unprofessional, no? (Photo: IMGUR/snickles19)
